channel.title: Comments on: Coding For The Classroom: SubmitMe
channel.description: iteration, making, building, and coding in education

item.title: By: Brian Bennett
item.dc:creator: Brian Bennett
item.description: Do you know of anyone using this on Windows? I'm having a hard time getting the computer visible from my mobile over the WiFi. Computer is hardwired in, other computers hardwired (neighbor teachers, etc) can see it. Think it's a difference in the WiFi IP and the ethernet?
item.content:encoded: Do you know of anyone using this on Windows? I’m having a hard time getting the computer visible from my mobile over the WiFi. Computer is hardwired in, other computers hardwired (neighbor teachers, etc) can see it. Think it’s a difference in the WiFi IP and the ethernet?
